de.esoco.data.process

Class SerializationDataWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.data.process.SerializationDataWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.data.element.DataWriter

    public class SerializationDataWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements de.esoco.data.element.DataWriter
    A wrapper for a GWT SerializationStreamWriter that also implements the DataWriter interface. Exceptions that may occur during writing will be wrapped into runtime exceptions.

    • Constructor Summary
